Posts.Content: I have been though chemo and radiation finished in Oct. 2004 for breast cancer. I was on Arimedex for about 2 mo but changed due to fatigue to femara but now I am expericing light headness and fatigue and when I stay of my feet for a while the bottom of my feet feel like they are bruised. Has any body else had this promblem and found a way to help. I am on vitimins and on a low fat diet. Can any one help me I know I need to stay on this for five years but how?
Posts.Title: Femara
